spec_data.Name: pdc-updater
spec_data.Description:
Fedmsg consumer that listens to activity on the Fedora message bus, and updates
the Product Definition Center database in response.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 19 Oct 2017 12:47:26 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Update the product definition center in response to fedmsg
